name: vscode-problems-bridge
description: Exports VS Code diagnostics (Problems panel) to a JSON file in the workspace.

problemsBridge.autoExport.description: Automatically export diagnostics when Problems data changes.

problemsBridge.outputPath.description: Relative or absolute path for exported diagnostics JSON.

problemsBridge.debounceMs.description: Debounce delay before writing diagnostics after a change.

problemsBridge.showNotifications.description: Show a brief status message after exporting diagnostics.
